Race.SpecificTitle: PW- School Board (Prop#1) -- Prop.#1 - $30,000,000 Bond - SB - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Proposition No. 1
(Bonds)

Summary: Authority to issue $30,000,000 of 20 year general obligation bonds of the
district for acquiring and/or improving lands for building sites and playgrounds, if
necessary, including construction of necessary sidewalks and streets adjacent thereto;
purchasing, erecting and/or improving school buildings and other school related facilities
within and for the District and acquiring the necessary equipment and furnishings
therefor, with the proceeds of the bonds (as such become available) to be first
dedicated and expended to pay the cost of those improvements described and set forth
in a resolution adopted by the Parish School Board prior to the election, said bonds to
be payable from ad valorem taxes.
Race.FullText:
Shall St. Martin Parish School District, Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue
bonds to the amount of Thirty Million Dollars ($30,000,000), to run twenty (20) years
from date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding seven per centum (7%) per
annum, for the purpose of acquiring and/or improving lands for building sites and
playgrounds, if necessary, including construction of necessary sidewalks and streets
adjacent thereto; purchasing, erecting and/or improving school buildings and other
school related facilities within and for the District and acquiring the necessary
equipment and furnishings therefor, title to which shall be in the public, with the
proceeds of the bonds (as such become available) to be first dedicated and expended
to pay the cost of those improvements, described and set forth in a resolution adopted
by the Parish School Board prior to the election, which bonds will be general obligations
of the District and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in
the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of
Louisiana of 1974 and statutory authority supplemental thereto?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW- School Board (Prop#2) -- Prop.#2 - 8.32 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Proposition No. 2
(Tax Renewal)

Summary: 10 year 8.32 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving,
maintaining and operating public school facilities in the District.
Race.FullText:
Shall St. Martin Parish School District, Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to
continue to levy an eight and thirty-two hundredths (8.32) mills tax (the estimated
amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year
being $1,774,772) on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten
(10) years beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose
of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating public school facilities in the
District?
